headline.main: Europe; Labor Is a Prime Factor in Hitler's Revolutionary War

lead_paragraph: On this Labor Day begins a second year of war for Europe and the most decisive year since 1776 in the life of America. All the reviews of the first year of the conflict focus on the military picture, and particularly on two...
